Only God Knows by Young Fathers is exceptional

@FitbaHacks hmmmm. Think anyone would be checking out best practice from other sports. Feels bizarre to me

Not one question about his past. One round of interviews at his unveiling and that's it?

@RossMcCaff aye. Worst is there's upside to it like in the US where you can get tickets for cheaper than retail because they're banned here
I mean, what an unfortunate series of event. You get tickets and discover so quickly you can't make it. Rotten luck
